projects.title: 1. Amal Raj (Client Portfolio)
projects.description: I designed and developed a captivating portfolio website using React, SASS, and Framer Motion, showcasing the client's creations with stunning animations and dynamic image galleries.

projects.title: 2. Self Info HUB
projects.description: Self Info Hub, is a simple project for my portfolio. My first project with some good layouts and different themes. It is responsive mostly on all screens.

projects.title: 3. Crypto HUB
projects.description: Crypto Hub, a second poject for portfolio in which I used API's of CoinGego exchange to fetch the data about different top exchanges and top coins in the World. It's responsive too.

projects.title: 4. PORTFOLIO
projects.description: The main PORTFOLIO project, in this project I have used different concepts and some special effects. A cool looking project in my point of view.
